code: @Deployment public static Archive<?> createSpringBootPackage() throws Exception {     return ArquillianPackager.springBootPackage(createTestConfig()). }
public static ITestConfig createTestConfig() {     return new ITestConfigBuilder().module(inferModuleName(CamelBindyTest.class)).build(). }

@Test public void componentTests() throws Exception {     this.runDataformatTest(config, "bindy-csv").     this.runDataformatTest(config, "bindy-fixed").     this.runDataformatTest(config, "bindy-kvp").     this.runModuleUnitTestsIfEnabled(config). }
